title: Candy Cane Nasus
body:
I know its't not quite the winter holidays yet but I believe Candy Cane Nasus would be a great holiday skin especially since he doesn't have one.

Think about it Nasus going around smashing people with a big candy cane... Hilarious

replies.body:
This is simple but I really like it.

Any ideas for particle effects for his P/W/E?
I literally thought of this on a whim but if I get more support for it I will invest more time into developing the idea, because honestly, it is simple but I really do like the idea too.

> [{quoted}](name=OnEyedSnake,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E0tugg3c,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-13T23:58:59.613+0000)
>
> I literally thought of this on a whim but if I get more support for it I will invest more time into developing the idea, because honestly, it is simple but I really do like the idea too.

Off the top of my head-

The lifesteal particle effect from his passive could look like sugary treats (similar to Lulu's candy skin).

Wither could look like dancing sugar plums orbiting the enemy.

His AoE zone could look like a patch of ice, of some sort of goopy chocolate spread.
I'm feeling wither should be taffy being stretched and pulled to mimic the animation now and E would be a big peppermint swirl.
I'm all for a 50cent Nasus. He can then have his pimp stick instead.
OMG this guy is a genius.... i would def buy it

Christmas time, lots of fun, big dog with a caaanneee, smashing faces racing bases nasus is a paaaaiinnnn!!
(Sing to the tune of jingle bells)
